AbstractCapability.description: Abstract capabilities are the storage system feature capabilities, in general terminology.

Account.description: doc-todo: General information about 'account' needed - what account - or type of account. something to guide the user.

AutoSDEProject.description: Use this for AutoSDE project information.

cores.description: The number of instance cores that are allowed per project. doc-todo: what is a CORE?

fixed_ips.description:
The number of fixed IP addresses that are allowed per project.
This number must be equal to or greater than the number of allowed instances.

floating_ips.description:
The number of floating IP addresses that are allowed
 per project.

injected_file_content_bytes.description:
The number of bytes of content that are allowed for
each injected file.

injected_file_path_bytes.description:
The number of bytes that are allowed
for each injected file path.

instances.description: The number of instances that are allowed per project. doc-todo: what is an instance? does it mean how many projects can exist at once?

key_pairs.description: The number of key pairs that are allowed per user. doc-todo: what is a key pair?

max_total_backups.description:
Maximum number of backups.
A backup is a full copy of a volume stored in an external service.
The service can be configured.
The only supported service is Object Storage. doc-todo:WHAT IS OBJECT STORAGE?
A backup can subsequently be restored from the external service to
either
         the same volume that the backup was originally taken from or
         to a new volume. Backup and restore operations can only be carried out on
         volumes that are in an unattached and available state.

max_total_snapshots.description: Maximum number of snapshots allowed per project.

max_total_volume_gigabytes.description: Maximum number of gigabytes allocated to volumes per project.

max_total_volumes.description: Maximum number of provisioned volumes in the project.

metadata_items.description: The number of metadata items that are allowed for each instance.

per_volume_gigabytes.description:
The size (GB) of volumes in request
 that are allowed per volume.

ram.description: The amount of instance RAM (MB) that are allowed per project. doc-todo: RAM per project, per specific project....?

security_groups.description: The number of security groups that are allowed per project.

AutoSDERole.description: doc-todo: what types of roles is this defining?

CapabilityTranslation.description: doc-todo: what is capabilityTranslationProps used for / what is it?.

Host.description: doc-todo: what 'host' is this defining or being filled in for? Fill in host properties: name, UUID, management IP address, and IQN.

HostVolumeConnection.description: Fill in the host volume connection properties.

Profile.description: doc-todo: which profile is being defined??

type.description: Type values are 'Native' or 'Abstract'. doc-todo:I need to know that I got these values correct.

logical_total.description: The Total logical capacity of this resource (gb)
The Total logical capacity of this resource (gb)
The Total logical capacity of this resource (gb)

StorageSystem.description: Use to define storage system properties.

SystemType.description: Use to define the storage system type.

Volume.description: Define volume properties on a specific storage resource.
